title: All Ur Biogods Are Belong to Us
author: VD
content_html:
The goal of investigation should not be to advocate the simplest explanation, but rather, to enumerate all of the possible explanations, improbable as well as likely, and then devise tests to eliminate some of them.

E.O. Wilson, Sociobiology: The New Synthesis, 1975

DISCUSS ON SG
